dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, did you, uh, happen to catch the latest Forbes list of America's wealthiest celebrities?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, did you, uh, happen to catch the latest Forbes list of America's wealthiest celebrities?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, you know I did, A! [chuckles] Always fascinating to see who's raking it in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, you know I did, A! Always fascinating to see who's raking it in.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And, um, top of the list, still the king: George Lucas, with a cool $5.4 billion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And, um, top of the list, still the king: George Lucas, with a cool five point four billion dollars.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Incredible, isn't it? And he's, like, always collaborating with Steven Spielberg, who's also super high up there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Incredible, isn't it? And he's, like, always collaborating with Steven Spielberg, who's also super high up there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Spielberg's number two. But get this, Michael Jordan actually saw his net worth *decrease* by $400 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Spielberg's number two. But get this, Michael Jordan actually saw his net worth decrease by four hundred million dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Michael Jordan (No. 4; $1.7 billion) climbs up the ranking with a $400 million net worth increase derived from his sneaker fortune and a 90% stake in the increasingly valuable Charlotte Hornets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I saw that! His sneaker fortune, uh, apparently underperforming. But he's still got, like, $1.7 billion. So, I mean, don't feel too bad for him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I saw that! His sneaker fortune, uh, apparently underperforming. But he's still got, like, one point seven billion dollars. So, I mean, don't feel too bad for him.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Michael Jordan (No. 4; $1.7 billion) climbs up the ranking with a $400 million net worth increase derived from his sneaker fortune...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] Definitely not. Still, uh, pretty wild to see a drop for someone like him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely not. Still, uh, pretty wild to see a drop for someone like him.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the overall total for the top ten is actually down this year, right? Like, $18.7 billion, which is apparently less than Iceland's entire GDP.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the overall total for the top ten is actually down this year, right? Like, eighteen point seven billion dollars, which is apparently less than Iceland's entire G D P.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: America's 10 wealthiest celebrities hold a combined fortune of $18.7 billion, more than the GDP of Iceland. Forbes' third annual ranking of the net worths of the famous boasted the biggest cumulative figure since we began tallying totals, up 4% from 2017's $18 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, crazy, huh? Down 4% from last year. But new to the list, and a big talking point, is Kylie Jenner.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, crazy, huh? Down four percent from last year. But new to the list, and a big talking point, is Kylie Jenner.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely! She was, like, *almost* the youngest self-made billionaire ever, um, with $900 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely! She was, like, almost the youngest self-made billionaire ever, um, with nine hundred million dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: New to the list this year is Kylie Jenner, whose $900 million net worth puts her on track to become the youngest self-made billionaire ever.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But her makeup sales for Kylie Cosmetics? Shut down, apparently losing over $630 million since launch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But her makeup sales for Kylie Cosmetics? Shut down, apparently losing over six hundred thirty million dollars since launch.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 21-year-old runs Kylie Cosmetics, which has shifted more than $630 million in makeup since its launch two years ago by targeting her 168 million-plus social media followers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Which is wild because she still owns 100% of the business!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is wild because she still owns one hundred percent of the business!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Jenner owns 100% of the bare-bones business, a stake valuable enough to put her among America's Richest Self-Made Womenand land her a spot on the cover of Forbes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right! She talks about social media being an amazing platform for connecting with fans, but also, you know, that's where the sales went down.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! She talks about social media being an amazing platform for connecting with fans, but also, you know, that's where the sales went down.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 21-year-old runs Kylie Cosmetics, which has shifted more than $630 million in makeup since its launch two years ago by targeting her 168 million-plus social media followers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a double-edged sword, I guess. And she's tied with Jay-Z, who's also seen his net worth, uh, dip a bit this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a double-edged sword, I guess. And she's tied with Jay-Z, who's also seen his net worth, uh, dip a bit this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: His net worth is up $90 million from 2017's figure thanks to lucrative stakes in companies including Armand de Brignac champagne and D'Ussé cognac...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. His champagne, cognac, Roc Nation holdings... all a bit down. But he had that classic quote about artists making money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. His champagne, cognac, Roc Nation holdings... all a bit down. But he had that classic quote about artists making money.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: His net worth is up $90 million from 2017's figure thanks to lucrative stakes in companies including Armand de Brignac champagne and D'Ussé cognac, plus holdings in his entertainment empire Roc Nation and streaming service Tidal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: 'Greatest trick in music,' I mean, he's always been so smart about that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Greatest trick in music, I mean, he's always been so smart about that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! And, uh, shout out to David Copperfield, Diddy, Tiger Woods, and James Patterson who are also on the list.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! And, uh, shout out to David Copperfield, Diddy, Tiger Woods, and James Patterson who are also on the list.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 7. David Copperfield $875 million 8. Diddy $825 million 9. (tie) Tiger Woods $800 million 9. (tie) James Patterson $800 million

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a really interesting mix. And I like that they focus on people who got rich from their fame, not just, like, inherited wealth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a really interesting mix. And I like that they focus on people who got rich from their fame, not just, like, inherited wealth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Eligibility was limited to American citizens whove gotten rich off their fame, rather than become famous for their wealth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it makes it more, uh, compelling, I think. Always a fun read.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it makes it more, uh, compelling, I think. Always a fun read.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely! What a list.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely! What a list.
